bibl.title: Notes on Papyri.
bibl.note: Thirty notes. - 1. Notes on Juridical Texts. - 2. Grammatical Notes. - 3. Miscellaneous Notes. - P. Cairo Preis. 34 = S.B. XVI, 12340; P. Gen. sans No. d'Inv. = S.B. I, 16-17; P. Mich. Inv. 191 = S.B. IV, 7354; P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 24494 = S.B. XX, 14612.
VAN MINNEN Peter, Notes on Papyri.

145.4 B.G.U. I, 34; 77; II, 603; III, 860; XIV, 2418; XV, 2494 C.P.R. I, 32; 240 P. Berlin Sarischouli 19 P. Cairo Preis. 34 P. Gen. sans No. d'Inv. P. Giss. I, 78 P. Grenf. I, 9 P. Heid. VII, 394; 397; 401 P. Iand. VI, 116 P. Mich. Inv. 191 P. Oxy. I, 43 recto; XXII, 2342 P. Paris Louvre 21 ter P. Prag. I, 61 A-B; II, 167 P. Ryl. IV, 639 P. Stras. 35 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 24494 145.4 / 145.5 P. Lips. I, 33 145.4 / 145.8 P. Lond. IV, 1462 x
